topic.title: How are namespaces used in refset creation?

section.title: e.g. The UK (1000000) and UK Drug Ext (1000001) namespace identifiers are part of new SNOMED IDâ€™s. How is the distinction made for new content such as refset creation as to which extension it belongs?
section.p: Currently the ID generator derives the namespace and project code from the name of the SCT ID mapping files stored in the release project's src/main/sct-uuid-maps folder.
e.g. the branched NHS cfh release project currently has mapping files named NHS-REFSET- ....txt.

The first part indicates the namespace, and the second is the project. A default configuration of these was set up in dwfa-mojo:org.dwfa.maven.transform.SctIdGenerator. NHS=namespace (value of 1999999), refset=project (value of 03).
